Articles.Content:
I have a big problem. When I press "F1", a file is created in the "Screenshots" folder, but the picture is all black and sized to the respective resolution. It contains nothing. I have tried changing game resolution and nothing happened.

 

I'm running KSP x64 1.1.3 and I force openGL to allow for higher RAM room (I have modded my game severely). Windows 7.

 

My GameData folder:

 

The "Screenshots" folder:

 

Update: I restarted the game and screenshots work now (after changing resolution); however, I'm not yet putting this question off the forum because a.) it may be possible that the problem comes back and b.) because I and other players who are experiencing the same problem want to know a quick emergency solution.

Update: The problem keeps reappearing! Please help me!

Edited August 11, 2016 by MedwedianPresident
Do you still experience the problem if you do not force OpenGL? The trick to force OpenGL is not really necessary anymore with the appearance of the 64bits version.
